# Vue Maplibre - A Vue 3 based component library

- Vue Maplibre is a Vue3 based component library of Maplibre GL for developers.

## Documentation

- [Config Provider](https://vue-maplibre.meteosci.com/en-US/component/config-provider)
- [VmControlNavigation](https://vue-maplibre.meteosci.com/en-US/component/control-navigation)
- [VmControlTerrain](https://vue-maplibre.meteosci.com/en-US/component/control-terrain)
- [VmLayerGltf](https://vue-maplibre.meteosci.com/en-US/component/layer-gltf)
- [VmLayerNative](https://vue-maplibre.meteosci.com/en-US/component/layer-native)
- [Map](https://vue-maplibre.meteosci.com/en-US/component/map)
- [Changelog](https://vue-maplibre.meteosci.com/en-US/guide/changelog)
- [Commit Examples](https://vue-maplibre.meteosci.com/en-US/guide/commit-examples)
- [Development FAQ](https://vue-maplibre.meteosci.com/en-US/guide/dev-faq)
- [Local Development](https://vue-maplibre.meteosci.com/en-US/guide/dev-guide)
- [Internationalization](https://vue-maplibre.meteosci.com/en-US/guide/i18n)
- [Installation](https://vue-maplibre.meteosci.com/en-US/guide/installation)
- [Quick Start](https://vue-maplibre.meteosci.com/en-US/guide/quickstart)
